pkgmetadata.longdescription: Two-Way Error Component SUR Systems Estimation on Unbalanced Panel Data // Generalized Least Squares (GLS) estimation of Seemingly Unrelated Regression (SUR) systems on unbalanced panel in the one/two-way cases also taking into account the possibility of cross equation restrictions. Methodological details can be found in Birn (2004) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2003.10.023 and Platoni, Sckokai, Moro (2012) doi:10.1080/07474938.2011.607098.
